custom-attributes.custom-attribute: <script src="https://widgets.openpay.com.au/lib/openpay-widgets.min.js"></script> <script> OpenpayWidgets.Config({ region: 'AU', currency: '$', planTiers: [2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8], minEligibleAmount: 100, maxEligibleAmount: 5000, type: 'Online' }); </script> <opy-learn-more-button></opy-learn-more-button>
